title: Episode 60: Robert Sietsema
description: Cathy Erway is joined by gastronomic superhero and Village Voice food critic Robert Sietsema. They explore the word “foodie” from it’s earnest origins to it’s shallow current state and discuss everything from perfect buffalo wings to the capitalist exploitation of our nations genuine interest in good food. This episode was sponsored by S. Wallace Edwards & Sons. For more information visit www.SurryFarms.com
author: info@heritageradionetwork.org (Heritage Radio Network)
